name: Cummins&Partners
description:
Cummins&Partners is Australia's leading independent creative:media agency.  A creative:media agency? Yes we've brought creative and media back together. cummins&partners is a full service creative agency, as well as a media planning and buying agency. Bringing these two disciplines back together as the medium and message must work together to be fully effective. 
 
Cummins&Partners proudly develop 'enduring brand platforms that drive action'​.
